explains: adj. 大量的，丰富的，充足的

sentences.en: There is an abundant supply of cheap labour.
sentences.cn: 有丰富的廉价劳动力供应。

sentences.en: I have ever had abundant love experiences.
sentences.cn: 我曾经有过丰富的感情经历。

sentences.en: Our country has a vast territory and abundant resources.
sentences.cn: 我国土地辽阔， 资源丰富。
